languages.text: "Четвертый Складочный — один из беднейших секторов нижних палуб. Там живут кланы разнорабочих. Они не так ценны для корабля, как семьи, поколениями обслуживающие отдельные системы. Легко заменяемый ресурс, который теперь, вдобавок, покрывает культистов и приспешников Архиврага".

"Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general labourers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialised systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succour to cultists and minions of the Archenemy."
languages.original_text: "Четвертый Складочный — один из беднейших секторов нижних палуб. Там живут кланы разнорабочих. Они не так ценны для корабля, как семьи, поколениями обслуживающие отдельные системы. Легко заменяемый ресурс, который теперь, вдобавок, покрывает культистов и приспешников Архиврага".

traits.locale_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general laborers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialized systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succor to pirates and minions of the Archenemy."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general laborers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialized systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succor to pirates and minions of the Archenemy."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialized systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succor to pirates and minions of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general labourers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialised systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succour to cultists and minions of the Archenemy."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “四号货栈是底层甲板最贫穷的区域之一。许多普通劳工氏族都住在那里，对这艘船而言，他们的价值并不如那些世世代代提供专业服务的家族。那些劳工是一种很容易被替代的资源，而且此时此刻，他们更多地是在协助异端分子与混沌大敌的爪牙。”
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general labourers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialised systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succour to cultists and minions of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: “四号货栈是底层甲板最贫穷的区域之一。许多普通劳工氏族都住在那里，对这艘船而言，他们的价值并不如那些世世代代提供专业服务的家族。那些劳工是一种很容易被替代的资源，而且此时此刻，他们更多地是在协助海盗与混沌大敌的爪牙。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «El Depósito 4 es uno de los sectores más pobres de las cubiertas inferiores. Es el hogar de clanes de trabajadores generalistas. No tienen tanto valor para la nave como las familias que han servido en sistemas especializados durante generaciones. Son un recurso fácilmente reemplazable, que por si fuera poco ahora está proporcionando asilo a cultistas y a los sirvientes del Archienemigo».
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general labourers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialised systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succour to cultists and minions of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: «El Depósito 4 es uno de los sectores más pobres de las cubiertas inferiores. Es el hogar de clanes de trabajadores generalistas. No tienen tanto valor para la nave como las familias que han servido en sistemas especializados durante generaciones. Son un recurso fácilmente reemplazable, que por si fuera poco ahora está proporcionando asilo a piratas y a los sirvientes del Archienemigo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「第四倉庫は下層デッキの中でも最も貧しいセクターのひとつです。一般労働者の一党が暮らしています。彼らは船にとって、何世代にもわたって専門システムに仕えてきた家族ほどの価値はありません。彼らは簡単に交換可能な資源であり、その資源は今や、教団や渾沌の勢力の手先に力を与えるものとなってしまっています」
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general labourers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialised systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succour to cultists and minions of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: 「第四倉庫は下層デッキの中でも最も貧しいセクターのひとつです。一般労働者の一党が暮らしています。彼らは船にとって、何世代にもわたって専門システムに仕えてきた家族ほどの価値はありません。彼らは簡単に交換可能な資源であり、その資源は今や、教団や渾沌の勢力の手先に力を与えるものとなってしまっています」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Depot 4 ist einer der ärmsten Sektoren der Unterdecks. Dort leben Clans einfacher Arbeiter. Sie sind für das Schiff weniger wertvoll als die Familien, die seinen spezialisierten Systemen seit Generationen dienen. Sie sind eine leicht zu ersetzende Ressource — und eine die nun zudem Kultisten und Schergen des Erzfeindes unterstützt."
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general labourers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialised systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succour to cultists and minions of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Depot 4 ist einer der ärmsten Sektoren der Unterdecks. Dort leben Clans einfacher Arbeiter. Sie sind für das Schiff weniger wertvoll als die Familien, die seinen spezialisierten Systemen seit Generationen dienen. Sie sind eine leicht zu ersetzende Ressource — und eine die nun zudem Piraten und Schergen des Erzfeindes unterstützt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Le dépôt 4 est l'un des secteurs les plus pauvres des ponts inférieurs. Il abrite des clans d'ouvriers à tout faire, bien loin d'être aussi indispensables au vaisseau que les familles qui entretiennent ses systèmes opérationnels depuis des générations. C'est une main-d'œuvre aisément remplaçable, et un foyer insurrectionnel favorable aux cultistes et autres sbires à la solde du Grand Ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general labourers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialised systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succour to cultists and minions of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: « Le dépôt 4 est l'un des secteurs les plus pauvres des ponts inférieurs. Il abrite des clans d'ouvriers à tout faire, bien loin d'être aussi indispensables au vaisseau que les familles qui entretiennent ses systèmes opérationnels depuis des générations. C'est une main-d'œuvre aisément remplaçable, et un foyer insurrectionnel favorable aux pirates et autres sbires à la solde du Grand Ennemi. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "4. Depo, alt güvertedeki en yoksul sektörlerden biridir. Genel işçi klanlarına ev sahipliği yapar. Bu klanlar, nesiller boyu geminin özel sistemleri için çalışmış aileler kadar değerli görülmezler. Yerleri kolayca doldurulabilen klan mensupları, bu gerçeğe karşın tarikatçılara ve Şerbaşı'nın kullarına yardım ve yataklık etmektedir."
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is one of the poorest sectors on the lower decks. It is home to clans of general labourers. They are not as valuable to the ship as the families who have served its specialised systems for generations. They are an easily replaceable resource — and one which is now, more besides, giving succour to cultists and minions of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Depo 4, alt güvertedeki en yoksul sektörlerden biridir. Genel işçi klanlarına ev sahipliği yapar. Bu klanlar, nesiller boyu geminin özel sistemleri için çalışmış aileler kadar değerli görülmezler. Yerleri kolayca doldurulabilen klan mensupları, durumlarına karşın tarikatçılara ve Şerbaşı'nın kullarına yardım ve yataklık etmektedir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
